showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // {Aeris}
“Whew! Finally made it off!
Now what?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Aeris}
“My house is over here.
Hurry before they come.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // “I saw her!
I really did!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // “This woman just disappeared!
Right there around the old church.”{PAUSE}“I waited around a long time,
but she never came out again!”{PAUSE}“I tell you, it's one of them
…haunted churches!
Ohhh…shiver…shake…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // “I saw her!
I really did!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // “Then with a big rumble, the sector 7
plate came crashing down on the slum.”{PAUSE}“Oh man, if something like that ever
fell on us…ohhh…shiver…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // “I saw her!
I really did!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // “A really weird guy lives inside of
some Huge Materia! And then there were
9 little devils! Ohh…shiver…shake…”{PAUSE}“Huh?
Oh, uh, no, I uh…
really didn't see it myself…I uh,
well, it was more like a, whaddya
call…rumor I heard.”{PAUSE}“All right. It was a lie.
I just made it up because
nothing's been happening around
here lately.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // [Save Point]
Access menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

dialogStrings:
{Aeris}
“Whew! Finally made it off!
Now what?”

{Aeris}
“My house is over here.
Hurry before they come.”

“The Sector 5 and Sector 6
slums are right ahead…”{PAUSE}“Do you know what kind of place they are?
{CHOICE}Tell me about sector 5
{CHOICE}Tell me about sector 6
{CHOICE}Yeah, I know

“Sector 5 slum…
It's not a big town.”{PAUSE}“No thrills, no danger. But there
are a few stores so if there's
something you want, stop by.”

“Sector 6 slum…heh heh heh,
A man's paradise.
I've always wanted to go.”

“…But not for a nice girl like you…
But there may be something else
good for you. Heh, heh, heh.”

“Yeah, but it's a little dangerous
over there, you know.”{PAUSE}“That's all I got to say. If you want
to know more, you'll have to go there
yourself. But you can't just waltz
over there anytime you feel like it.”

“Hmm…
Then, I'll do as I please.”

“HEY! Looks like they were in Sector 6.
Have fun?”{PAUSE}“That reminds me, you don't hear
much about Corneo lately.
Wonder what happened to him?”

“This woman just disappeared!
Right there around the old church.”{PAUSE}“I waited around a long time,
but she never came out again!”{PAUSE}“I tell you, it's one of them
…haunted churches!
Ohhh…shiver…shake…”

“Then with a big rumble, the sector 7
plate came crashing down on the slum.”{PAUSE}“Oh man, if something like that ever
fell on us…ohhh…shiver…”

“A really weird guy lives inside of
some Huge Materia! And then there were
9 little devils! Ohh…shiver…shake…”{PAUSE}“Huh?
Oh, uh, no, I uh…
really didn't see it myself…I uh,
well, it was more like a, whaddya
call…rumor I heard.”{PAUSE}“All right. It was a lie.
I just made it up because
nothing's been happening around
here lately.”

[Save Point]
Access menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.
